general.description:
A typical Irilia planet, mostly divided between sand deserts, tundras and forests, with small polar ice caps and oceans. Its wide biodiversity and rich ecosystems make it a prime provider of food for all the neighbouring sectors, and its high biocompatibility with all known lifeforms still enhanced this tendancy.
The drawback to this highly agricultural orientation is that the technological level has stayed low, despite tentatives of the local governments to create more tech-ventures. However, they have succeeded in attracting producers of generic food, that see in the planet's highly biocompatible life a great raw material for making wide-spectrum food products.
general.bar: A varied crowd of all sentients, most of them somewhat linked to some agricultural concern
